channel.title: 24 / 7 Server?
channel.description: Is it possible to make a 24/7 server buy a hosting ore something, so my computer not have too be on all day? :confused:

item.title: 24 / 7 Server?
item.dc:creator: @Patrickdds Patrickdds
item.description:
@Patrickdds wrote:

[quote=“lvl 3 claws, post:2, topic:279350”]idk i kinda no if you go to vpsland.com and buy like an 18$thing then u can turn ur comp off takes like 48 hrs butt here ill give u this

thats the vps info i hope i helped

Our VPS plans give you the superior Control, Security, and Flexibility that Businesses and Power Users require. All of our VPS plans are feature rich and functionally equivalent to a dedicated server. Each VPS plan gives you the following benefits…

Complete System Isolation
Dedicated IP Address(es)
Choice of OS (Linux plans)
Windows 2003 Server (Windows plans)
Connect directly using SSH, Remote Desktop or Terminal Services
Full Root/Administrator Access over the entire Operating System
Install/Uninstall Programs or Services
Customize your Server Software
Install Custom Software
Independent Servers and Services: Apache/IIS6, FTP, SMTP, BIND, Databases, etc…
Advanced Dell Dual-Xeon Hardware
Protected by Enterprise Firewall/Intrusion Prevention appliances
Industry Leading Connectivity
99.9% Uptime Guarantee
FREE Online Support![/quote]

I try that thanks

Read full topic
